headline: What Johnson Controls International (JCI)'s AI-Powered Retail Sensors Mean For Shareholders
summary: Sensormatic Solutions, a Johnson Controls brand, recently introduced AI-enabled Orbit AI sensors and Video AI cameras that feed into ShopperTrak Analytics to help retailers understand shopper journeys, optimize layouts and improve staffing decisions without using personally identifiable information. This move highlights how Johnson Controls is applying artificial intelligence and privacy-conscious sensing to turn in-store behavior data into actionable insights for retailers’ revenue and...
